Title: Mee Shivajiraje Bhosale Boltoy
Actors: Makarand Anaspure, Suchitra Bandekar, Priya Bapat, Ankush Chaudhari
Plot: Dinkar Maruti Bhosle, a common Marathi man with an identity crisis ends up being the Crusader against threats to his existance & identity as a 'Marathi Maanus'. In his battle against all odds & evils, he is assisted by Shivaji Maharaj.
